text: The Ape is a 1940 American horror movie directed by William Nigh and starring Boris Karloff, Maris Wrixon, Gene O'Donnell, Dorothy Vaughan, Gertrude W. Hoffmann. It was distributed by Monogram Pictures.The Ape article at Turner Classic Movies It was based on the 1924 play by Adam Hull Shirk. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1940 movies Category:1940s horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by William Nigh Category:Black-and-white movies Category:Movies about apes
title: The Ape (1940 movie)
